name: Space Maze (itch) (georeb)
description:
SPACE MAZE

   Space Maze is a puzzle game where the planets are being sucked through a worm hole and end up in a maze (IN SPACE) . You job is to navigate the maze  collect electricity and unblock blocked areas and get out of the wormhole. There are 4 levels to complete at the moment with a lot more to add if there is enough interest in my game . I intend to add packman type levels and sideways gravity . The instruction are all within the game so Have a go at it and let me know what you think Good Or Bad

Just Been Updated With 3 More Levels  One With invisible walls And A Pacman type level Also Sound Effects
